group_1.textCenter: No matter how much I imagine having@time to myself,
once I actually do get it, I don't really know what@to do with it...

group_1.textRight: Why not take up a new hobby,@if you have the time?

group_1.textLeft: I can't think of anything specific right now,@but yes, a new challenge might be good.

group_1.textRight: Or maybe it's time to think about@getting a steady job...?

group_1.textLeft: C'mon...@You can't just drop reality on me like that...
Still, it does seem like some students are already@going for internships.
I'm certainly no stranger to working while@in school...

group_1.textRight: Do you think you'll keep working in the@entertainment industry?

group_1.textLeft: ...It's an option, but maybe not the same@sort of job.
As much as I hate to admit it, I've lost my@enthusiasm for this sort of work...

group_1.textRight: Hm...@It's hard to figure out what you really want.

group_1.textLeft: Actually, I do know.@I want to bring back Mikazuki Villa.
I want to revive it into a lively boarding house@like it was in the past.

group_1.textRight: What a nice dream!@I can't wait to see it come to life!

group_1.textLeft: Thanks to the future you gave me,@I can have those sort of dreams.
But it's difficult now that you've left me behind.
You're not a part of my days anymore...
And so I can't imagine that future that everyone@else takes for granted...
To have a lover... Or a job...

group_1.textRight: I'm still happy.

group_1.textLeft: ...You would say that, Iroha, but...I'm not.

group_1.textRight: Yachiyo...

group_1.textLeft: Everything in the future I imagined was supposed@to have you in it.
Even here at Mikazuki...!
Ahh... I don't want to think about this anymore...@This...is why I need to stay busy...

group_1.textRight: I'm hooooome!

group_1.textLeft: *Gasp*

group_1.textRight: I bumped into her along the way, so we went@shopping together!

group_1.textLeft: And I got invited along too!
I brought back some Banbanzai special bamboo@shoots! Let's have 'em with dinner!
...Does bamboo go with hamburg steaks at all?
Whatever. I'll get dinner ready.@Do you guys have everything we need?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, we got it all right here!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you.

group_1.textRight: I'll help too...

group_1.textLeft: Thank you, too.

group_1.textRight: The recipe's in this notebook, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that's where she kept her@hamburg steak recipe.
...Erm... This page...

group_1.textRight: Hm? Yachiyo?

group_1.textLeft: (Oh no... Please, not now... I should've taken@some time before looking...)

group_1.textRight: Yachiyo!
Felicia told me this had no taste,
so I came up with a new hamburg steak recipe!
What do you think?
Hey! Yachiyo!@You don't look so good...!
Didja eat something bad?!
Y-you should take the rest of the day off if@you're not feeling good...

group_1.textLeft: R-right... I'm sorry, guys...@I'll take the night off...

group_1.textCenter: (Just looking at the recipe notes was@overwhelming...)
(It's a terrible feeling...but I can't control it...!)

group_1.narration: (Everyone has worked through their feelings and moved on,@but when it comes to Iroha, I'm still entangled...)
(No matter what I say or do to make myself feel better,@the feelings keep building up, and won't fade...)
(I want us all to live at Mikazuki Villa again...@I want everyone who has forgotten you to remember...)
(I want to bring you back, Iroha...)
I know it's arrogant of me...@After everything I said to everyone...
(Ahh... This is just like when Mifuyu disappeared...@I feel all sense and reason sinking away...)
